text: V kharaktere cheloveka yest' takiye cherty, kak otchayaniye i vysokomeriye. Kogda My posylayem cheloveku zdorov'ye, bol'shoy udel, on ne vspominayet Nas, ne molitsya Nam i otdalyayetsya ot Nas, oburevayemyy gordyney. Kogda zhe yego postignet bedstviye, kak bolezn' ili bednost', on vpadayet v otchayaniye, ne nadeyas' na milost' Allakha
